page.title: 10EMERGENCY SERVICES: TILBURY
page.content:
{Tilbury Fire Station}was built between 1920-1926 in the{Civic Square}and the new part was built in 1967. There are two fire engines and 44 firemen. Only six firemen can sit in the fire engine. Some firemen have yellow hats and some have white hats and they all wear black boots and yellow over trousers. A fireman always carries a pad and a pencil and a piece of rope. The firemen have to work all over Essex. They have to help in the Docks and rescue people on the River Thames and on the motorways.
{Tilbury Police Station}serves all local areas. There are 3 cells in the building and 3 official investigation rooms. There are 3 Panda cars and 1 Sierra. The police work in shifts, and go to some fires.They enjoy their work.
